content.text: Match ends, Napoli 2, Manchester City 1.
Second Half ends, Napoli 2, Manchester City 1.
Foul by Vincent Kompany (Manchester City).
Goran Pandev (Napoli) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Napoli. Federico Fernández replaces Andrea Dossena.
Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City).
Ezequiel Lavezzi (Napoli) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Morgan De Sanctis.
Attempt saved. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by James Milner.
Substitution, Manchester City. Adam Johnson replaces Pablo Zabaleta.
Attempt saved. Mario Balotelli (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Samir Nasri with a cross.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Andrea Dossena.
Offside, Manchester City. Aleksandar Kolarov tries a through ball, but Mario Balotelli is caught offside.
Substitution, Napoli. Goran Pandev replaces Edinson Cavani.
Attempt missed. Mario Balotelli (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Samir Nasri.
Substitution, Manchester City. Sergio Agüero replaces Edin Dzeko.
Attempt blocked. Mario Balotelli (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by David Silva.
Edinson Cavani (Napoli) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City).
Ezequiel Lavezzi (Napoli) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City).
Mario Balotelli (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Salvatore Aronica (Napoli).
Attempt saved. Mario Balotelli (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Yaya Touré with a through ball.
Vincent Kompany (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card.
Marek Hamsik (Napoli) hits the right post with a left footed shot from the right side of the box. Assisted by Edinson Cavani following a fast break.
Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Ezequiel Lavezzi (Napoli).
Substitution, Manchester City. Samir Nasri replaces Nigel de Jong.
Corner,  Napoli. Conceded by Joe Hart.
Attempt saved. Ezequiel Lavezzi (Napoli) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marek Hamsik.
Offside, Napoli. Edinson Cavani tries a through ball, but Ezequiel Lavezzi is caught offside.
Offside, Manchester City. James Milner tries a through ball, but Aleksandar Kolarov is caught offside.
David Silva (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Walter Gargano (Napoli).
Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Napoli. Blerim Dzemaili replaces Gökhan Inler because of an injury.
Attempt missed. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.
Foul by David Silva (Manchester City).
Andrea Dossena (Napoli) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Christian Maggio (Napoli).

Mario Balotelli (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Mario Balotelli (Manchester City).
Hugo Campagnaro (Napoli) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Gökhan Inler (Napoli) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Walter Gargano.
Attempt missed. Marek Hamsik (Napoli) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left.
Attempt blocked. Marek Hamsik (Napoli) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrea Dossena.
Goal!  Napoli 2, Manchester City 1. Edinson Cavani (Napoli) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Andrea Dossena with a cross.
Foul by Christian Maggio (Napoli).
Yaya Touré (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Second Half begins Napoli 1, Manchester City 1.
First Half ends, Napoli 1, Manchester City 1.
Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by James Milner with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Christian Maggio.
Attempt saved. Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by David Silva with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Vincent Kompany (Manchester City) header from the left side of the six yard box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Aleksandar Kolarov with a cross following a corner.
